title: Overlay: write overlay_render_report.json for automation
scope: Write a machine-readable report for overlay rendering runs (ok/errors + deterministic hashes) to aid automation and audits.
Do not change required bundle layout validation requirements.
acceptance: render-overlay writes overlay_render_report.json (default path alongside output) containing ok/errors and deterministic fields (e.g., vf hash).
Report is written deterministically (sorted keys) and is bounded in size.
Unit tests cover report writing behavior (where feasible).

deliverables.title: Report writing implementation
acceptance: Report includes vf_sha256 and draw op counts.
evidence: Local render-overlay run produces the report; tests remain green.
